'''''Pelagic Primaevality''''' is the second [[Fontaine]] Chapter [[soundtrack]] album.

It features three discs with a total of 68 soundtracks produced by the [[HOYO-MiX]] team.

The album was first announced on January 19, 2024, during the [[Special Program]] for [[Version 4.4]]. The tracklist was announced on February 23 and the album was released on February 26.<ref>Sina Weibo: [https://weibo.com/6593199887/O1Umia3gm {{zh|「《原神》第二张枫丹篇OST即将上线 」}}]</ref>

==Trivia==
*The title of first disc, {{Fr|Les grandes eaux qu'elle avait veillées}}, is French for "the great waters that she had watched over."
*The title of the third disc, ''Ad Consummationem Aquarum'', is Latin for "until the consummation of waters."
